scripts.build:vendor: mkdir -p static/js/vendor && cp node_modules/powerbi-client/dist/powerbi.min.js static/js/vendor/ && cp node_modules/panic-overlay/build/panic-overlay.browser.js static/js/vendor/panic-overlay.min.js
scripts.dev: bun run build && screenly edge-app run
scripts.deploy: bun run build && screenly edge-app deploy
scripts.lint: echo 'No linting configured for vanilla JS app'
scripts.format: sh -c 'filtered=""; for arg in "$@"; do if [[ "$arg" == --* ]]; then filtered="$filtered $arg"; elif [ -f "$arg" ] || [ -d "$arg" ]; then filtered="$filtered $arg"; fi; done; if [ -n "$filtered" ]; then prettier --write $filtered; else exit 0; fi' _
scripts.format:check: sh -c 'filtered=""; for arg in "$@"; do if [[ "$arg" == --* ]]; then filtered="$filtered $arg"; elif [ -f "$arg" ] || [ -d "$arg" ]; then filtered="$filtered $arg"; fi; done; if [ -n "$filtered" ]; then prettier --check $filtered; else exit 0; fi' _
scripts.prettier: sh -c 'filtered=""; for arg in "$@"; do if [[ "$arg" == --* ]]; then filtered="$filtered $arg"; elif [ -f "$arg" ] || [ -d "$arg" ]; then filtered="$filtered $arg"; fi; done; if [ -n "$filtered" ]; then prettier $filtered; else exit 0; fi' _
